Hoeven & Bennet Introduce Truth in Buffalo Labeling Act WASHINGTON – Senators John Hoeven (R-ND) and Michael Bennet (D-Colo.) have reintroduced bipartisan legislation to strengthen the labeling of US bison products and prevent water buffalo products from being deceptively labeled as buffalo.
